body_content.explanation: in a way that is three times or many times as much, as many, as big, as often, etc.:
examples: This acid has one quadruply negative, two quadruply positive, and one triply positive carbon atom.
You have to be doubly, triply, quadruply sure that the data is accurate when the effects of a mistake are so serious.
She had to be triply brave on missions in order to win the recognition a man would receive.
